question: 瓶詰
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: What's <kanji>stuffed</kanji> in the <kanji>bottle</kanji>? Jam you <vocabulary>bottled</vocabulary> for later! How could you forget?
sourceReadingMnemonic: This word consists of the on'yomi reading for <ja>瓶</ja> and the kun'yomi reading for <ja>詰</ja> that you learned when you learned <ja>詰める</ja>. You've learned them both so as long as you remember the rendaku, you should be able to read this word too! Just remember that <ja>詰</ja> is taking the <ja>め</ja> from <ja>詰める</ja> with it in this word too. You can't see it, but it's there.
